mapper.select: SELECT uf.id, uf.group_id, uf.file_url, uf.file_name, uf.store_id FROM upload_file AS uf INNER JOIN goods_image AS gi ON uf.id=gi.image_id WHERE uf.store_id=#{storeId} AND gi.store_id=#{storeId} AND gi.good_id=#{goodId} ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE upload_file SET group_id=#{groupId}, update_time=NOW() WHERE INSTR(CONCAT(',',#{ids},','),CONCAT(',',id,',')) AND store_id=#{storeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upload_file(storage, group_id, file_url, file_name, file_size, file_type, extension, deleted, store_id, add_time, update_time) VALUES(#{storage}, 0, #{fileUrl}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{extension}, 0, #{storeId}, NOW(), NOW())
